name: Jelly Flowers
description:
Grow your magical garden and discover the secret of Painted Pond!

✧ Learn about amphibians as a frogmaid developing her human half~

✧ Make aquatic friends and collect jelly flower seeds to plant~

✧ Read excerpts from classic books and fill out your nature journal~

✧ Get cozy in a hand-painted collage environment~

✧ Relax to nature sounds and an original soundtrack~

Created in a month!

~Free during the Blossom VN Jam, but $3 starting in June~

🎵 music by Veldmar: https://soundcloud.com/veldmar
